description:
Initiative Tracker compatible with Pathfinder 2 encounter rules
Initiative tracker is an android app to track encounters in role playing games like Pathfinder 2.
It supports showing and editing the current state on multiple devices at the same time.
All devices that are connected to the same WiFi are linked to each other (when the devices are allowed to talk to each other).
Once new devices join and lost devices rejoin, the state is exchanged.

It supports the following Pathfinder 2 encounter rules:
- Player characters come only after non-player characters
- When a character dies, it's turn moves to just before the current character
- Characters can delay their turn
